text: Joshua Walter Kimmich (born 8 February 1995) is a German footballer. He plays as a right-back or defensive midfielder for Bundesliga club Bayern Munich and the Germany national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National Cup Europe Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals RB Leipzig 2013–14 3.
